title: "Georgia Tech Machine Learning Students Earn J.P. Morgan AI Ph.D. Fellowships"
excerpt: "The 2022 cohort for the J.P. Morgan AI Ph.D. Fellowships Program includes Pranav Shetty and Zijie “Jay” Wang, both students in the Machine Learning Ph.D. program at Georgia Tech. The Institute is the only university with multiple recipients among the new group of 11."
